speaker: Clinician
text: And, uh, when you mentioned the palpitations, have they been less frequent since we adjusted the levothyroxine dose?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I think so. It's, um, not as bad as before, but I still get them sometimes. It's a bit worrying.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. It's important we keep an eye on that. Have you been able to, uh, get your refills on time, or has transportation been an issue lately?

speaker: Patient
text: Well, it's been a bit tricky. My neighbor usually helps, but she's been busy. I managed last time, but it was close.

speaker: Clinician
text: Okay, let's see if we can set up a delivery service for your medication. That might help ease some of the stress.

speaker: Patient
text: That would be great. I didn't know that was an option. It would really help.
